NK041(di)024:1: // dkar gsur gtsang ma la chab bran /
NK041(di)024:2: +aa h'u gis 'dod yon mi zad pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi 'khor lo brlabs la /
NK041(di)024:3: hoh dkar gsung ngo bo bde chen ye shes la //
NK041(di)024:4: rnam pa mi zad 'dod dgur 'char ba yi //
NK041(di)024:5: gtsang ma lha rdzas char gyi zhing kun khyab //
NK041(di)024:6: mi zad nam mkha' mdzod du gyur pa 'dis //
NK041(di)024:7: dkon mchog srid zhu'i mgron rnams thugs dam bskang //
NK041(di)024:8: mgon po yon tan mgron rnams dgyes pa bskyed //
NK041(di)024:9: rigs drug snying rje'i mgron rnams bde dang ldan //
NK041(di)024:10: bgegs rigs lan chags mgron rnams tshim gyur cig /
NK041(di)024:11: gnas dang yul gzhi gter gyi bdag po barngana //
NK041(di)024:12: 'go ba'i lha mgon ma lus mnyes byed cing //
NK041(di)024:13: mchod cing bstod pa'i mgron du 'os pa kun //
NK041(di)024:14: yid kyi re ba yongs su skong bar shog /
NK041(di)024:15: srid pa'i spyi lha yul 'di'i yul lha dang //
NK041(di)024:16: khyim 'di'i khyim lha skyes bu'i 'phrag lha sogs //
NK041(di)024:17: phyogs dus 'di dang 'brel ba'i lha 'dre rnams //
NK041(di)024:18: yid mthun 'dod yon mkho dgus tshim gyur cig /
NK041(di)024:19: lan chags bdag po gnod byed 'dre gdon rigs //
NK041(di)024:20: tshe rku srog 'phrog dpal la gnod pa dang //
NK041(di)024:21: dri za srid pa bar ma'i sems can rigs //
NK041(di)024:22: ma lus 'khor bcas bde bas tshim gyur cig /
NK041(di)024:23: bdag dang khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)024:24: tshe rabs thog med lan chags ma lus byang //
NK041(di)024:25: phral gyis rkyen bgegs gyur pa kun zhi nas //
NK041(di)024:26: bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog /
NK041(di)024:27: mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun //
NK041(di)024:28: phan tshun byams ldan bde chen dpal la spyod //
NK041(di)024:29: chos la gzhol zhing re ba yongs su rdzogs //
NK041(di)024:30: thams cad phyam gcig sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK041(di)024:31: de ltar dmigs la +aahmh'u ji mang bazla'o //
